meanings.definition: Capable of being connected to a plumbing system.
meanings.sent1: The new sink was plumbable, making it easy for the plumber to install.
meanings.sent2: The plumbable pipes were quickly connected by the skilled plumber.
meanings.sent3: The plumbable shower head decided to take a vacation and disconnected itself for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in aligning the shelves was as plumbable as a professional plumber's work.
meanings.sent5: The plumbable nature of the fittings ensured a leak-free plumbing system.

meanings.definition: Suitable for installation by a plumber.
meanings.sent1: The plumbable fixtures were perfect for the plumber to work with.
meanings.sent2: He chose the plumbable materials for the plumbing job.
meanings.sent3: The plumbable toilet suddenly decided to moonlight as a singer.
meanings.sent4: Her instructions were as plumbable as a plumber's blueprint.
meanings.sent5: The plumbable design of the house made the plumber's job a breeze.
